title: What Next TBD: How Schools Surveil Your Kids
description:
In schools across the country, tighter digital controls were put in place to keep kids on task during the pandemic. Are they here to stay?

Guests: Priya Anand, reporter at Bloomberg

Host: Lizzie O’Leary
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: What Next TBD: How Schools Surveil Your Kids
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: A startup named GoGuardian is changing the way teachers monitor their students online.
